item.title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R India Launch Date Officially Confirmed; Check Expected Specs, Price - Zee News
item.description:
OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R India Launch Date Officially Confirmed

Date: January 7, 2025 | Source: Zee News

The OnePlus 13 series, including the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, is set to launch globally with a special event in India.

  • The launch event will commence at 9:00 pm IST on January 7, 2025, coinciding with OnePlus's 11th anniversary.
  • The smartphones will be available via Amazon and OnePlus India e-store.
  • Globally, the OnePlus 13 has already been released in China.
  • The expected price for OnePlus 13 is around Rs 65,000.
  • Specifications include a 6.82-inch Quad-HD+ AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, and a triple camera setup.
“The event will be live-streamed on OnePlus’s official channels.”

For more updates, stay tuned to official sources regarding the OnePlus 13 series.

item.title: Tech News Today Live Updates on December 18, 2024: POCO M7 Pro 5G smartphone first impressions: Budget segment, redefined! | Mint - Mint
item.description:
POCO M7 Pro 5G smartphone first impressions: Budget segment, redefined!

Date: 18 Dec, 2024 Source: LiveMint

The POCO M7 Pro 5G promises to redefine the budget smartphone segment by offering premium features at an affordable price.

  • The POCO M7 Pro 5G features a 120Hz AMOLED display, a 50MP camera, and powerful performance under ₹17,000.
  • The article discusses the growing importance of staying informed about technological advancements affecting consumers and industries.
“In an era dominated by rapid technological evolution, staying informed with the latest technology news is essential.”

This smartphone aims to deliver flagship-like features to budget-conscious consumers, impacting the smartphone market significantly.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air to launch next year: India price, specs and more - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air to Launch Next Year: India Price, Specs and More

Publication Date: N/A Source: India Today

The iPhone 17 Air is expected to launch alongside the iPhone 17 and 17 Pro models, replacing the Plus model, with speculations of a September 2025 launch.

  • The iPhone 17 Air is anticipated to feature a thinner battery due to new electric glue technology, which will allow for a slimmer profile.
  • This new battery tech may help reduce the iPhone's weight and thickness, making it the slimmest iPhone yet.
  • Rumors suggest it may not come with a SIM tray, utilizing space for a thinner design.
  • All iPhone 17 models are rumored to support 120Hz ProMotion displays for improved scrolling and responsiveness.
  • Performance improvements with an upgraded chipset are expected, making it more powerful than the iPhone 16 Plus.
  • The estimated price of the iPhone 17 Air in India could be around Rs 89,900.
“The iPhone 17 Air might not even come with a SIM tray.”

This upcoming model promises a sleek design and advanced features, setting a new standard for smartphones in the market.

item.title: OpenAI challenges Google: ChatGPT Search now free for all users - India TV News
item.description:
OpenAI Challenges Google: ChatGPT Search Now Free for All Users

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: India TV News

OpenAI, one of the most popular chatbot's founding companies has intensified competition with Google by making its ChatGPT Search feature free. This AI-powered search engine is now accessible to all users, promising to revolutionize online search.

  • ChatGPT Search, launched in November 2024, was initially for paid users only.
  • The feature is now free, positioning it as a direct competitor to Google.
  • It offers a user-friendly interface with direct answers and sources for queries.
  • OpenAI has introduced advanced voice mode for hands-free operation.
  • A map feature has been integrated, allowing users to locate nearby places.
  • Continuous updates aim to enhance user experience and functionality.
“The free availability of ChatGPT Search…could significantly disrupt the dominance of traditional search engines like Google.”

This move by OpenAI represents a significant shift in the online search landscape, potentially offering users a fresh alternative to traditional search engines.

item.title: Realme 14x 5G, Poco M7 Pro, CMF Phone 1, and more: Best smartphones to buy under Rs 15,000 in 2025 - The Financial Express
item.description:
Best Smartphones Under Rs 15,000 in 2025

Date: Today
Source: Financial Express

The Realme 14x 5G is set to launch in India, offering great value for budget-conscious buyers with a mix of durability and features, though it comes with a 720p display. Other notable options include the Poco M7 Pro, CMF Phone 1, Xiaomi Redmi 13, and Vivo T3x, all priced under Rs 15,000, ensuring users get quality technology without breaking the bank.

Key Points:

  • Realme 14x 5G: Features a 6.67-inch 120Hz display, MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor, and rugged build for Rs 14,999.
  • Poco M7 Pro: Offers a 6.67-inch 1080p AMOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 7025 Ultra, and a 50MP dual-camera for Rs 14,999.
  • CMF Phone 1: Unique design with 6.67-inch AMOLED display and dual camera setup, priced from Rs 14,999.
  • Redmi 13 5G: Includes a 6.79-inch display and powerful Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor, from Rs 13,999.
  • Vivo T3x 5G: Features a 6.72-inch display, a Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 processor, and various RAM/storage options starting at Rs 13,499.
“The Realme 14x blends affordability with features appealing to young consumers.”

This list highlights excellent smartphones that provide high functionality at affordable prices, catering to the growing demand in the budget segment.

item.title: From Snapdragon 8 Elite to MediaTek Dimensity 9400 and Snapdragon X Elite: Mobile and laptop processors of 2024 - The Hindu
item.description:
From Snapdragon 8 Elite to MediaTek Dimensity 9400 and Snapdragon X Elite: Mobile and laptop processors of 2024

Published Date: December 18, 2024 | Source: The Hindu

This article reviews the latest processors in mobile and laptop technology introduced in 2024, including major players such as Qualcomm and MediaTek. It highlights the advancements in processing power and features that shape modern devices.

  • Overview of new mobile processors like MediaTek Dimensity 9300 and Snapdragon 8 Gen 3.
  • Introduction of affordable 5G processors like Snapdragon 4s Gen 2.
  • Launch of MediaTek Dimensity 9400 and Snapdragon 8 Elite, focusing on their specifications.
  • Qualcomm's entry into the laptop market with Snapdragon X Elite.
  • Intel Core Ultra 200V series offering improvements in computing efficiency.
"These processors provide significant enhancements in AI capabilities and overall performance for both mobile and laptop platforms."

The advancements in processor technology for 2024 signify a continued push towards more powerful and efficient devices, meeting the demands of modern users.

item.title: Google Drive Document Scanner gets AI-powered Auto Enhancement feature - India TV News
item.description:
Google Drive Document Scanner gets AI-powered Auto Enhancement feature

Publication Date: Not specified Source: India TV News

Google has upgraded its Drive Document Scanner tool on Android with a new feature called "auto enhancements", aiming to improve the resolution and image quality of digitized documents. This feature will be available to both Google Workspace users and personal Google account holders.

  • The Auto Enhancements feature enhances scanned documents by addressing common issues like poor lighting and contrast.
  • It provides automatic suggestions for improvements, ensuring scanned documents appear clearer and more professional.
  • The feature supports files saved as PDFs or JPEGs, enhancing user utility.
  • This rollout follows several recent updates to Google Drive’s mobile scanner.
  • The auto enhancements feature will start rolling out to users in early January 2025.
“Once the feature is rolled out, it will work automatically after a document is scanned, simplifying the process for users.”

This upgrade is part of Google's continuous efforts to enhance the functionality of its scanning tool, making document management more efficient for users.

item.title: Realme 14x 5G launched in India with IP69 rating and 6,000 mAh battery - The Hindu
item.description:
Realme 14x 5G launched in India with IP69 rating and 6,000 mAh battery

Date: December 18, 2024 Source: The Hindu

Realme has launched the Realme 14x 5G smartphone in India, featuring high water resistance and a large battery capacity.

  • First smartphone in the segment with IP68 and IP69 water resistance.
  • 6.67 inch display with a 120 Hz refresh rate and 625 nits brightness.
  • 6,000 mAh battery with a 45 W charger included.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset with up to 8 GB RAM and 128 GB storage.
  • Runs on Realme UI 5.0 based on Android 14.
  • 50 MP rear camera and 8 MP front camera.
  • Available in Crystal Black, Golden Glow, and Jewel Red colors.
  • Price: 6 GB/128 GB variant at ₹14,999 and 8 GB/128 GB variant at ₹15,999.
“The mid-segment phone brings features like sonicwave water ejection and rainwater smart touch.”

The Realme 14x 5G offers robust features for a mid-range smartphone, focusing on durability and performance.

item.title: Poco M7 Pro 5G launched under Rs 15,000: 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skip - India Today
item.description:
Poco M7 Pro 5G launched under Rs 15,000: 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skip

Published On: Dec 18, 2024 | Published By: Aman Rashid

The Poco M7 Pro 5G is an affordable smartphone in the sub-Rs 15,000 price segment, offering impressive features like a 120Hz display and good performance while having some limitations regarding software support.

Key Points:

  • A stunning 120Hz display: 6.67-inch FHD+ AMOLED with peak brightness of 2,100 nits.
  • Sleek and lightweight design: Comfortable to hold with a plastic back and vibrant colors.
  • Reliable performance and battery life: MediaTek Dimensity 7025 Ultra processor with a 5110mAh battery and 45W fast charging.
  • 50MP camera with OIS: Primary camera for high-quality photos with optical image stabilization.

1 reason to skip:

Limited software support: Promises only two years of OS updates and does not ship with the latest Android version.

item.title: Realme 14X 5G smartphone with 6000 mAh battery, IP68 + IP69 ratings launched in India: Price, specs and m - The Times of India
item.description:
Realme 14X 5G smartphone with 6000 mAh battery, IP68 + IP69 ratings launched in India: Price, specs and more

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: [News Source]

The Realme 14X 5G has been launched in India, featuring a high-capacity 6000 mAh battery and dual IP68 and IP69 ratings for water and dust resistance.

  • 6,000 mAh battery capacity for extended usage.
  • IP68 and IP69 ratings ensure durability and water-resistance.
  • 5G capability enhances connectivity and speed.
  • Competitive pricing strategy aimed at the middle segment of the smartphone market.
“This device offers an excellent balance of performance and durability,” stated a company representative.

The Realme 14X 5G is positioned as a strong contender in India’s competitive smartphone market, aiming to attract consumers with its combination of power, resilience, and affordability.

item.title: Apple reveals most downloaded apps, games from App Store in India in 2024 - The Hindu
item.description:
Apple Reveals Most Downloaded Apps and Games in India for 2024

Published: December 18, 2024 12:56 pm IST

Source: The Hindu

Apple has revealed the most downloaded apps and games in 2024 from their App Store in India. WhatsApp leads as the most popular free app, while the Forest: Focus on Productivity app ranks as the top paid app.

  • Top free app: WhatsApp
  • Top paid app: Forest: Focus on Productivity
  • Other paid apps: Money Manager, DSLR Camera, Shadowrocket, iTabla Pro, Voice Recorder
  • Top free games: BGMI, Ludo King, Subway Surfers, Candy Crush Saga, Zupee
  • Top paid game: Minecraft
  • Apple Arcade highlights: Getting Over It+, NBA 2K24 Arcade Edition, Snake.io+, Asphalt 8: Airborne+, Angry Birds Reloaded
“Meta’s WhatsApp is the most popular free app among iPhone users.”

These rankings showcase the popular trends in app usage among iPhone users in India for 2024, reflecting both social media engagement and gaming interests.

item.title: After a year-long pause, GSV Ventures looks to invest in Indian edtechs in 2025 | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
GSV Ventures to Re-Enter Indian Edtech Market in 2025

Date & Source: Mumbai, Mint

After a year-long absence from Indian edtech startups, GSV Ventures is preparing to invest again in the Indian market, as revealed by Deborah Quazzo, managing partner at GSV Ventures.

GSV Ventures, known for investing exclusively in edtech companies globally, is set to finalize two new deals, including one in India, expected to be announced in 2025.

Key Points:

  • GSV Ventures has stayed away from Indian edtech for a year.
  • Plans to announce two new investment deals in 2025.
  • Focus remains solely on the edtech sector worldwide.
“After staying away from Indian edtech startups for a year, GSV Ventures is warming up to the Indian market again.” - Deborah Quazzo

The re-engagement in the Indian edtech space marks a significant development, as GSV Ventures looks to capitalize on emerging opportunities in a rapidly evolving educational landscape.

item.title: Poco C75 5G vs Moto G35 5G: How the two entry-level Android smartphones compare - The Times of India
item.description:
Poco C75 5G vs Moto G35 5G: How the two entry-level Android smartphones compare

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Unavailable

This article provides a detailed comparison between the Poco C75 5G and the Moto G35 5G, focusing on their specifications, performance, and user experience.

  • The Poco C75 5G offers a stronger camera system.
  • The Moto G35 5G is praised for its battery life.
  • Both devices target budget-conscious consumers.
  • User interface and software experience differ significantly between the two.
“The Poco C75 5G leads in camera quality, while the Moto G35 5G excels in battery performance.”

Overall, the choice between the Poco C75 5G and Moto G35 5G comes down to personal priorities like camera use versus battery longevity.

item.title: Google rolls out Gemini 2.0 Flash and Gemini-Exp-1206 - The Hindu
item.description:
Google Introduces Gemini 2.0 Flash and Experimental AI Model Gemini-Exp-1206

Published: December 18, 2024 11:01 am IST | Source: The Hindu

Google is rolling out new experimental AI models, inviting Gemini Advanced users to explore Gemini-Exp-1206, which promises improved performance in coding, math, and reasoning tasks.

  • Gemini-Exp-1206 offers enhanced performance for complex coding and mathematical tasks.
  • Users can access this model via the Gemini model drop-down on both desktop and mobile platforms.
  • Limitations may include unpredictable responses and restricted real-time information access.
  • Last week, Google also launched the Gemini 2.0 Flash model, aiming for improved assistant features.
  • A model-switching feature is being rolled out for Android app users.
“Whether you’re tackling complex coding challenges, solving mathematical problems for school or personal projects, or providing detailed, multi-step instructions to craft a tailored business plan, Gemini-Exp-1206 will help you navigate complex tasks with greater ease.” - Patrick Kane, Google

As generative AI tools evolve, users should be cautious as new models may not always yield reliable or accurate answers.

item.title: China Becomes the Largest Wrist-Worn Device Market, Leading Global Growth - IDC
item.description:
China Emerges as the Largest Market for Wrist-Worn Devices, Driving Global Growth

Date: December 18, 2024

Source: International Data Corporation (IDC)

According to IDC's latest report, China's wrist-worn device market has shipped 45.8 million units, marking a 20.1% increase year-over-year, making it the largest segment globally.

  • Global wrist-worn device shipments totaled 139.0 million units, a decline of 1.0% year-over-year.
  • Chinese smartwatches specifically increased by 23.3%, reaching 32.9 million units shipped.
  • Significant growth across brands with Huawei leading in shipments followed closely by Apple, Xiaomi, and Samsung.
  • Market trends are driven by increasing consumer demand for health monitoring and sports-related features.
  • Projected shipments for China's wrist-worn market in 2025 are expected to reach 62.5 million units, a growth of 3.2%.
"The current market is dominated by price and channel-driven strategies, and product strength will be further enhanced by new technological innovations." - Sophie Pan, Research Director of IDC China

The growth in China's wrist-worn device market indicates a significant trend towards enhanced health monitoring technologies and diversified product offerings aimed at consumers' evolving needs.

item.title: iOS 18.3 in beta testing: Top features, release date, and other details - India Today
item.description:
iOS 18.3 in beta testing: Top features, release date, and other details

Published On: Dec 18, 2024

Published By: Aman Rashid

Apple’s iOS 18.3 beta introduces minor updates, including robot vacuum support in the Home app, addressing bugs, and making small interface adjustments, with an expected public release in late January.

  • Initial beta available to developers started on December 16.
  • Key feature: Robot vacuum support in the Home app for easier control and automation.
  • Bug fixes include personalisation issues with Genmojis and improvements to third-party app experiences.
  • Minor interface tweaks, including updates to icons and accessibility settings.
  • Anticipated bigger features will likely arrive in future updates like iOS 18.4.
“For now, this update seems to focus on refining the small details that make the iPhone experience smoother.”

item.title: OnePlus 13 India launch date announced: Know what’s coming in January 2025 - HT Tech
item.description:
OnePlus 13 India Launch Date Announced for January 2025

Publication Date & Source: Last week, OnePlus confirmed the global launch for OnePlus 13 in January 2025.

The OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R are set to launch together, featuring enhanced specifications and designs compared to their predecessors.

OnePlus 13 India Launch Date

According to a post from OnePlus India, the flagship OnePlus 13 will be launched on January 7, 2025. The company might also reveal the OnePlus 13R, indicating multiple devices in the OnePlus 13 series.

Specifications and Features

  • 6.82-inch 2K+ AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate
  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite processor with options for 16GB or 24GB RAM
  • Triple camera setup: 50MP main, 50MP telephoto with 3x optical zoom, and 50MP ultra-wide
  • 32MP selfie camera
  • 6000mAh battery with 100W SuperVOOC fast charging

Price Expectations

The OnePlus 13 is speculated to be priced under Rs. 70,000 in India, but the final pricing will be confirmed at launch.

item.title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R , Buds 3 Pro India Launch On January 7: Expected Price, When And Where To Watch OnePlu - Times Now
item.description:
OnePlus 13 Series and Buds Pro 3 Launch Set for January 7, 2025

Date: January 7, 2025
Source: Times Now

After teasing the launch recently, OnePlus has confirmed that the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R will be unveiled on January 7, 2025, along with the OnePlus Buds Pro 3. The event will be live-streamed on their social media channels.

  • Launch on January 7, 2025, at OnePlus Winter Event.
  • Expected price for OnePlus 13 is Rs 69,999, and OnePlus 13R around Rs 45,000.
  • OnePlus 13 features a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, IP68 & IP69 rating, and a 6,000mAh battery.
  • OnePlus 13R expected to include Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and a 6,500mAh battery.
  • OnePlus Buds Pro 3 will introduce AI Translation features.
“This is the first OnePlus device to achieve both the IP68 and IP69 rating.”

The upcoming OnePlus 13 series promises significant upgrades and innovative features, aiming to enhance user experience.

item.title: What Are Instagram Trial Reels And How Can They Be Used For Testing Content? - NDTV Profit
item.description:
What Are Instagram Trial Reels And How Can They Be Used For Testing Content?

Date: 18 Dec 2024, Source: NDTV Profit Tech

Instagram has introduced trial reels, a feature that allows content creators to test new content by sharing it with non-followers before deciding to publish it more widely.

  • Trial reels permit creators to explore various genres and styles without pressure.
  • Non-followers will see trial reels first, helping gauge content performance.
  • If satisfied with the results, users can share the reel with their followers seamlessly.
  • Performance metrics, including views and likes, can be tracked after 24 hours of sharing.
“Trial reels enable creators to understand audience reactions before full publication.”

This new feature provides a valuable way for content creators to innovate while minimizing the risk of disengaging their existing audience.

item.title: OnePlus 13 launching next month in India: 5 upgrades expect - India TV News
item.description:
OnePlus 13 launching next month in India: 5 upgrades expect

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: India TV News

OnePlus is gearing up to unveil its highly anticipated flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 13, in January 2025. The global debut will coincide with its launch in India, bringing several upgrades over its predecessor. Here’s a closer look at the top five enhancements expected in the OnePlus 13.

  • Enhanced performance with cutting-edge chipset: The OnePlus 13 will be powered by the latest Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, promising a 40% increase in CPU performance.
  • Refined design and durability: Featuring a Vegan leather finish option alongside glass variants and rumored IP69 rating for water and dust resistance.
  • A Sleeker, flatter display: Adopting a flat display design with an LTPO panel supporting high refresh rates.
  • Upgraded Camera System: Improved camera setup including a 50MP telephoto sensor and Hasselblad tuning.
  • Bigger battery, same fast charging: A 6,000 mAh battery with 100W fast charging capabilities.

Launch date: January 7, 2025, at 9:00 PM IST.
